trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> 控件中定义一个矩形作用点区域。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义中的一个矩形作用点区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件。

trans-unit.source: To define the region of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 x 坐标值左上角。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标值左上角。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 x 坐标值。

trans-unit.source: Set of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 y 坐标值。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>单击控件、 页面导航到 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specifies this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性指定此行为。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到的 URL，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`并用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>属性来指定要导航到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: To post back to the server, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将发布回服务器，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`并用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>属性指定的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此名称将传递中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>事件数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>单击。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to have no behavior, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象不具有任何行为，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，这导致页后，可以将回发到服务器每次用户单击某个作用点区域。

trans-unit.source: Each time the user clicks one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A> method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 每次用户单击其中一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A>调用方法并向用户显示的选定作用点的坐标。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects, set their properties, and add them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的底边的 y 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定一个值，此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created declaratively and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property, are set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以声明方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性，以声明方式设置。

trans-unit.source: The other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created programmatically and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property, are set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以编程方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性，以编程方式设置。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，该字符串表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个字符串，表示的坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象的左上角和其下的坐标右下角。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用的值分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>要返回的前几位的坐标属性左上角。

trans-unit.source: It uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 它将使用分配给值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>要返回的坐标底部右下角属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A> method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A>方法为内部 ASP.NET 可用于获取要使用的坐标的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>呈现时。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串为特定于浏览器和标记语言。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，这导致页后，可以将回发到服务器每次用户单击某个作用点区域。

trans-unit.source: Each time the user clicks one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A> method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 每次用户单击其中一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A>调用方法并向用户显示的选定作用点的坐标。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形区域左边的 x 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 矩形区域左边的 x 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的左侧的 x 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定一个值，此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created declaratively and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property, are set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以声明方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>属性，以声明方式设置。

trans-unit.source: The other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created programmatically and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property, are set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以编程方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>属性，以编程方式设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形区域右边的 x 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 矩形区域右边的 x 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的右侧的 x 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定值对于此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created declaratively and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property, are set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以声明方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性，以声明方式设置。

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形区域顶边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 矩形区域顶边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot" /> 对象定义。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定值对于此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>包含两个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created declaratively and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property, are set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以声明方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>属性，以声明方式设置。

trans-unit.source: The other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object is created programmatically and its properties, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property, are set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>以编程方式创建对象及其属性，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>属性，以编程方式设置。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。
